name: Paket
help:
Paket is a dependency manager for .NET and mono projects, which is designed to work well with NuGet packages and also enables referencing files directly from Git repositories or any HTTP resource. It enables precise and predictable control over what packages the projects within your application reference.

If you want to learn how to use Paket then read the Getting started tutorial and take a look at the FAQs.

If you are already using NuGet for package management in your solution then you can learn about the upgrade process in the convert from NuGet section.

properties.name: PackageId
properties.help: NuGet package id.

properties.name: PackageVersion
properties.help: Allows to specify version of the package.

properties.name: DependencyGroup
properties.help: Allows to specify the dependency group.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Forces the download and reinstallation of all packages.

properties.name: Redirects
properties.help: Creates binding redirects for the NuGet packages.

properties.name: CreateNewBindingFiles
properties.help: Creates binding redirect files if needed.

properties.name: CleanRedirects
properties.help: Removes all binding redirects that are not specified by Paket.

properties.name: NoInstall
properties.help: Skips paket install process (patching of csproj, fsproj, ... files) after the generation of paket.lock file.

properties.name: KeepMajor
properties.help: Allows only updates that are not changing the major version of the NuGet packages.

properties.name: KeepMinor
properties.help: Allows only updates that are not changing the minor version of the NuGet packages.

properties.name: KeepPatch
properties.help: Allows only updates that are not changing the patch version of the NuGet packages.

properties.name: Filter
properties.help: Treat the nuget parameter as a regex to filter packages rather than an exact match.

properties.name: TouchAffectedRefs
properties.help: Touches project files referencing packages which are affected, to help incremental build tools detecting the change.

properties.name: Verbose
properties.help: Enable verbose console output for the paket process.

properties.name: LogFile
properties.help: Specify a log file for the paket process.

properties.name: Silent
properties.help: Suppress console output for the paket process.

properties.name: ShowVersion
properties.help: Display the version.

properties.name: FromBootstrapper
properties.help: Call coming from the '--run' feature of the bootstrapper.

properties.name: Force
properties.help: Forces the download of all packages.

properties.name: OnlyReferenced
properties.help: Allows to restore packages that are referenced in paket.references files, instead of all packages in paket.dependencies.

properties.name: TouchAffectedRefs
properties.help: Touches project files referencing packages which are being restored, to help incremental build tools detecting the change.

properties.name: IgnoreChecks
properties.help: Skips the test if paket.dependencies and paket.lock are in sync.

properties.name: FailOnChecks
properties.help: Causes the restore to fail if any of the checks fail.

properties.name: DependencyGroup
properties.help: Allows to restore a single group.

properties.name: ProjectFile
properties.help: Allows to restore dependencies for a project.

properties.name: ReferencesFiles
properties.help: Allows to restore all packages from the given paket.references files.

properties.name: TargetFramework
properties.help: Allows to restore only for a specified target framework.

properties.name: Verbose
properties.help: Enable verbose console output for the paket process.

properties.name: LogFile
properties.help: Specify a log file for the paket process.

properties.name: Silent
properties.help: Suppress console output for the paket process.

properties.name: ShowVersion
properties.help: Display the version.

properties.name: FromBootstrapper
properties.help: Call coming from the '--run' feature of the bootstrapper.

properties.name: Url
properties.help: Url of the NuGet feed.

properties.name: File
properties.help: Path to the package.

properties.name: ApiKey
properties.help: Optionally specify your API key on the command line. Otherwise uses the value of the `nugetkey` environment variable.

properties.name: Endpoint
properties.help: Optionally specify a custom api endpoint to push to. Defaults to `/api/v2/package`.

properties.name: Verbose
properties.help: Enable verbose console output for the paket process.

properties.name: LogFile
properties.help: Specify a log file for the paket process.

properties.name: Silent
properties.help: Suppress console output for the paket process.

properties.name: ShowVersion
properties.help: Display the version.

properties.name: FromBootstrapper
properties.help: Call coming from the '--run' feature of the bootstrapper.

properties.name: OutputDirectory
properties.help: Output directory to put .nupkg files.

properties.name: BuildConfiguration
properties.help: Optionally specify build configuration that should be packaged (defaults to Release).

properties.name: BuildPlatform
properties.help: Optionally specify build platform that should be packaged (if not provided or empty, checks all known platform targets).

properties.name: PackageVersion
properties.help: Specify version of the package.

properties.name: TemplateFile
properties.help: Allows to specify a single template file.

properties.name: Exclude
properties.help: Exclude template file by id.

properties.name: SpecificVersion
properties.help: Specifies a version number for template with given id.

properties.name: ReleaseNotes
properties.help: Specify relase notes for the package.

properties.name: LockDependencies
properties.help: Get the version requirements from paket.lock instead of paket.dependencies.

properties.name: MinimumFromLockFile
properties.help: Get the version requirements from paket.lock instead of paket.dependencies, and add them as a minimum version. `lock-dependencies` will over-ride this option.

properties.name: PinProjectReferences
properties.help: Pin dependencies generated from project references (=) instead of using minimum (>=) for version specification.  If `lock-dependencies` is specified, project references will be pinned even if this option is not specified.

properties.name: Symbols
properties.help: Build symbol/source packages in addition to library/content packages.

properties.name: IncludeReferencedProjects
properties.help: Include symbol/source from referenced projects.

properties.name: ProjectUrl
properties.help: Url to the projects home page.

properties.name: Verbose
properties.help: Enable verbose console output for the paket process.

properties.name: LogFile
properties.help: Specify a log file for the paket process.

properties.name: Silent
properties.help: Suppress console output for the paket process.

properties.name: ShowVersion
properties.help: Display the version.

properties.name: FromBootstrapper
properties.help: Call coming from the '--run' feature of the bootstrapper.
